name: Gay Wave Trail
description: make your wave (and kayla) a raging homosexual >:3

main-section.name: Gay asf :PPP
main-section.description: HOLY CRAP. Lois, LOIS! the world record holder on unnerfed sakupen circles uses my mod. this is so AWESOME. - Peter Griffin

speed.name: GOTTA GO FAST
speed.description:
the speed of the alphabet mafia
should not be underestimated.
(sets the speed at which the
wave trail changes color)

wave-pulse-size.name: It's pulsing...
wave-pulse-size.description:
the wave trail that is.
(sets the wave trail pulse size)

wave-trail-size.name: it even left a trail...
wave-trail-size.description:
that of which you can change the size...
(sets the wave trail size)

persist-wave-trail.name: Keep going...
persist-wave-trail.description: Insted of just "oh yes", it's now "oh yeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-" (makes the wave trail stay after exiting the wave)

editor-trail.name: I slid into his dms and his editor...

rainbow-icon.name: First it was just the trail...
rainbow-icon.description:
NOW THE ICON TOO???
oh my fuckin sex, i
am so dissapointed.
(changes the wave icon color)

saturation.name: HOW GAY ARE YOU???
saturation.description:
You think you're more fruity than me? wrong.
(sets the color saturation of
the wave trail)

mirror-players.name: Mirror the Players
mirror-players.description:
It's like looking in a Bat-Mirror
- Batman
(mirrors the player
colors in dual mode)

solid-wave-trail.name: Blending in ain't that fun
solid-wave-trail.description:
food processors are better than blenders anyways
(disables wave trail blending)

disable-wave-trail.name: *cutely untrails your wave*
disable-wave-trail.description:
i may not be able to label your sexuality,
but grammarly can help you with your grammar.
Writing's not easy. That's why Grammarly can help. This
sentence is grammatically correct, but it's wordy, and hard to
read. It undermines the writer's message and the word choice is
bland.
(press Esc to close this btw)
Grammarly's cutting edge technology helps you craft
compelling, understandable writing that makes an impact on
your reader. Much better. Are you ready to give it a try?
Installation is simple and free. Visit Grammarly.com today!

use-gradient.name: Enable the GAYDIENT
use-gradient.description:
now with 4 colors! full 256
color rainbow NO MORE
(enables the usage of
the below custom colors
instead of a vanilla rainbow)

color-one.name: Wave trail color #1
color-one.description: The first color the wave trail will become

color-two.name: Wave trail color #2
color-two.description: The second color the wave trail will become

color-three.name: Wave trail color #3
color-three.description: The third color the wave trail will become

color-four.name: Wave trail color #4
color-four.description: The fourth color the wave trail will become

chaos.name: THE CHAOS EMERALDS
chaos.description: chaos insues when enabled (randomizes the placement of every point on the wave trail)

min-y-pos-offset.name: Red Emerald
min-y-pos-offset.description: the maximum amount the wave trail can be offset from the player's position

max-y-pos-offset.name: Blue Emerald
max-y-pos-offset.description: the maximum amount the wave trail can be offset from the player's position

min-x-pos-offset.name: Cyan Emerald
min-x-pos-offset.description: the minimum amount the wave trail can be offset from the player's position

max-x-pos-offset.name: Purple Emerald
max-x-pos-offset.description: the maximum amount the wave trail can be offset from the player's position

max-wave-pulse-size.name: Yellow Emerald
max-wave-pulse-size.description: the maximum size the wave trail can pulse to

min-wave-pulse-size.name: Green Emerald
min-wave-pulse-size.description: the minimum size the wave trail can pulse to

max-wave-trail-size.name: White Emerald
max-wave-trail-size.description: the maximum size the wave trail can be

min-wave-trail-size.name: Black Emerald
min-wave-trail-size.description: the minimum size the wave trail can be

skip-chance.name: THE MASTER EMERALD
skip-chance.description: the chance that a point will be skipped
